biz.onomato.frskydash.hub

Class Hub

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.onomato.frskydash.hub.Hub
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrSkyHub

    public abstract class Hub
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to provide (and enforce) basic hub functionality, All hub's must inherit this class
    Author:
    eso
